title: Issue when buying RP (Euw-Belgium)
body: So today i tried to buy some RP (10â‚¬ of Rp to be exact) at around 2pm. I have my bank card with money on it ofc, no restrictions on how much i can take out either but when i finish completing all the payment thing, they say (in dutch even tho i live in the french part of belgium) that the "financial institute" blocks me, that i can't buy RPs. I sent a request to the support but i know that I would have to wait their reply for atleast a week. The complicated thing is that i pay with maestro/bancontact which as far as i know is something only available for Belgium.. Thank you for your help ! :^)

replies.body: I went ahead and pulled up your ticket to see what might have been talking so long for a response. An agent was able to respond a bit ago, so you should be able to respond and work with those billing agents to figure this out!
